title: Speakers
text:
• Atul Kulkarni , National award-winning professional actor and President, QUEST.
• Irshad Kamil , Lyricist, Filmfare Awardee
• Ulrike Reinhard , Social Activist and Founder, Janwaar Castle
• Gaurav Juyal , Creative Visualizer and Artist, Disney's Art Attack
• Devina Kothari , Industrial Designer, The Red Dot Awardee
• Nirali Kartik Shah , Singer and Composer, Maati Baani
The TEDx videos are not out yet, Keep checking for updates.
